content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>ERDDAP</ShortName>   <Description>The ERDDAP at USGS is a data server that gives you a simple, consistent way to download subsets of scientific datasets in common file formats and make graphs and maps.</Description>   <Url type="application/atom+xml"        template="http://www1.usgs.gov/erddap/opensearch1.1/search?searchTerms={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}&itemsPerPage={count?}&format=atom"/>   <Url type="application/rss+xml"        template="http://www1.usgs.gov/erddap/opensearch1.1/search?searchTerms={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}&itemsPerPage={count?}&format=rss"/>   <Contact>csas@usgs.gov</Contact>   <Tags>atmosphere biology biosphere earth environment ocean science</Tags>   <LongName>ERDDAP at USGS</LongName>   <Image height="56" width="55">http://www1.usgs.gov/erddap/images/nlogo.gif</Image>   <Image height="313" width="313">http://www1.usgs.gov/erddap/images/noaa_simple.gif</Image>   <Image height="20" width="20">http://www1.usgs.gov/erddap/images/noaa20.gif</Image>   <Query role="example" searchTerms="datasetID" />   <Developer>Bob Simons (bob.simons at noaa.gov)</Developer>   <Attribution>USGS</Attribution>   <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>   <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>   <Language>en-us</Language>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>   <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
